TopicTitle: Clockwork's Spare Parts Air intake mass

Articles.Content:
In the release thread there were questions about what air intakes mass should be, so I thought I would post a poll. The intake has 8 times the intake space of a normal intake so it is very powerful in that respect, to offset this I have increased it's mass to 40 times the normal mass (0.4).

I didn't hear any replies on the release thread so I created this for a bit more anonymity.

release thread is here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107407-0-90-Clockwork-s-Spare-Parts-%28v1-00-15th-Jan-2015%29

Edited January 31, 2015 by Clockwork_werewolf
